attributes.action: Make parking free for all NHS staff at hospitals, and other NHS facilities
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government and parliament, to reform car parking charges, for NHS workers and make it free, I feel this is important as the NHS, is one of the biggest employers. As a result it should be setting an example to other companies, in regards to employee benefits, and good employer. Another reason it is vital to reform, is due the UK Struggles to employ NHS staff, and we recruit a lot of migrants, tackling this issue, would mean it  you could promote this on recruitment campaigns.
attributes.background: During the pandemic NHS had access to free car parking at hospitals and other NHS facilities.  This should be an employee benefit as they are vital key workers and have a massive input to everyone’s day to day lives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
